mainEntity.name: How do I add structured data to my website?
mainEntity.text: I want to add JSON-LD structured data to my website for better SEO. What's the best approach?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can add JSON-LD structured data by including a script tag with type application/ld+json in your HTML head section.

suggestedAnswer.text: Another option is to use microdata attributes directly in your HTML markup.
